stimulusHtml:
The architectural complex in the top image is the tomb of the Mughal emperor Humayun, created in Delhi, India, c. 1570 C.E. The architectural complex in the bottom image is the Taj Mahal, created in Agra, India, between 1632 and 1653 C.E.

Using specific evidence, explain how the tomb of the Mughal emperor Humayun influenced the design, function, and setting of the Taj Mahal.

How do both architectural complexes convey an Islamic vision of paradise?
